entry.title: Truein - Flutter Developer
entry.content:
Truein is a fast-growing B2B SaaS product company, offering Attendance & Timesheet solution to the companies with Contractual and Distributed workforce. 200+ customers across the globe now believe in what we do and have embarked on this journey with us.

Attendance tracking across multiple locations, Frequently changing staff, remote work sites, payroll-ready reports, and Workforce productivity – are some of the key problems faced by organizations across the globe.

At Truein, we are on a mission to bring transparency and controls in the attendance process. We leverage Face recognition and AI technology to create a seamless experience for both organization and their staff. We are backed by Investors and a high potential team.

Job brief:

We are looking for a Flutter Developer to join our team who will work closely with our team of talented engineers to design and build high-quality mobile applications. As a Flutter Developer, you will create multi-platform apps for iOS and Android using Google’s Flutter development framework. Deep experience contributing to and managing high-scale production mobile apps.

Responsibilities:

  • Experience building and deploying high-scale production mobile apps in Flutter
  • Translating UI/UX designs into code
  • Firebase
  • Advanced debugging/testing/optimization skills
  • Knowledge of Location Services, Maps, and other common Android/IOS libraries
  • Analyze and maintain existing software applications
  • Design highly scalable, testable code
  • Discover and fix programming bugs

Requirements:

  • Bachelor's degree or equivalent experience in Computer Science or related field
  • Experience: 2 to 3 years
  • Experience working with remote data via REST and JSON
  • Experience with third-party libraries and APIs
  • Solid understanding of the full mobile development life cycle
  • Preferred : Additional experience in Android development

You will get:

  • Competitive compensation package and benefits
  • Work closely with and be part of a truly amazing team
  • Join a fast-growing company early, make a difference and enjoy the ride
  • Challenge yourself and take your career to the next level
Apply

entry.title: Unbox Robotics - Electronics Production Engineer
entry.content:
We are a robot technology company building intralogistics solutions for the new age of warehousing. Our focus is on building compact and flexible solutions and business models to suit the needs of E-commerce and Logistics companies across varying scale and geographies.

We incorporated in 2019 and are based out of Pune, India with a small but swiftly growing team of passionate minds.

Work Experience

1 - 10 years of relevant Experience in Production Engineering

Salary Range

Competitive Salary

Work Mode

In Campus

Purpose:

  • Manage and maintain the company electronic production database, support associated workflow processes, compare & generate reports on a periodic basis.
  • Alert Management for Electronics production lifecycle
  • Develop strategies to improve the efficiency and effectiveness of the production process

Roles & Responsibilities:

  • Define and control production process including tooling and equipment.
  • Identify manufacturing needs for new products in development
  • Reduce variability in production process and manage KPIs by providing standard work methods and work instructions
  • Prepare all relevant manufacturing specifications, reports, and documentation.
  • Design and develop measurement systems and techniques for manufacturing operations in conjunction with internal experts and outside vendors.
  • Ensure production equipment meets all relevant Health, Safety, and Environment requirements through completion of required assessments and documentation.
  • Ensure all process development, validation, etc. is managed in accordance with the Quality management system.
  • Troubleshooting Production issues and fixing them as per the SLA.
  • Project Management - provide timely and accurate reporting on project activities ensuring projects are delivered to agreed timelines.
  • Identify opportunities for cost reduction, capacity improvement, and manage the delivery of savings.
  • Liaise and communicate with other departments, customers, suppliers to ensure smooth availability of products

    • Requirements

    • Familiarity with production of various electronic parts.
    • OMS (Obsolescence Management System) Tool’s knowledge
    • Exposure with ECAD part library management
    • Finding alternate production procedure in case of shortage or design change or for cost saving
    • Knowledge of Electronic production marketplace
    • Part rationalisation
    • Strong analytical and negotiation skills.
    • Excellent interpersonal and communication skills & self-driven

    Good to Have:

    • Experience in automotive/power/BMS is preferred
    • Experience with BMS is preferred
    • Knowledge of Eagle
    • Awareness of working with PLM tool
    • Awareness thermal management, enclosure designs.
    • Experience in building MIL grade certified products

    Eligible candidates:

    • Desired Qualification: Diploma/Bachelor Engineering in Electronics & Communication

    We Value:

    • Constant learner to become a Subject Matter Expert
    • Proven record in start-up environment working with innovations
    • Exposure to a high paced working environment
    • Ability to conduct detailed procedures in a time-constrained environment

    The role is based out of Bangalore (Work from Office)

    Apply

Work Experience

8-10 Years

Salary Range

Competitive Salary

Work Mode

In Campus

Roles & Responsibilities:

  • Deliver high-quality C code in a real-time embedded environment
  • Specify, design, and implement functionality and behaviors of embedded subsystems
  • Be involved in the full life-cycle of firmware development from concept through integration, test and high volume manufacturing
  • Contribute towards writing requirements with traceability to implementation and the test cases
  • Hands-on hardware bring up, system debugging and code optimization
  • Make performance and optimization trade-offs to meet product requirements
  • Contribute to technical designs and ECU requirements, safety analysis, and interface design between various microcontrollers
  • Interface with hardware and mechanical engineering teams, as well as clients and end-users of the products.
  • Managing a team of Embedded Software Engineers and being responsible for their performance management, career growth and development.
  • Defines a structured software solution that meets the technical requirements and interfaces while optimizing performance, security & reusability.
  • Translates requested business features into technical requirements and acceptance criteria used to direct development team and determine implementation completion
  • Work directly with stakeholders, engineering and test to create high quality products that solve customer problems.
  • Develop and execute plans for incremental and interactive project delivery.
  • Work with the test team to ensure adequate and appropriate test case coverage with defined Software quality metrics.
  • Debate and propose solutions to situations involving both people and technical complexities.
  • Develop business plans and proposals. Helps is framing strategies which are inline with current and foreseen business needs.
  • Maintaining good and healthy employee satisfaction index and guide, coach on career path. Diversity inclusive in nature.
  • Analyzes, designs, programs, debugs and modifies software. Troubleshoots code for firmware (IC embedded code) applications. Involves analog and digital hardware and software operating systems.
  • Handling the "line" management charter for the employees.
  • Represent the team on global platforms and be a leader from front.
  • Being part of review, planning and readout meetings.
  • Evaluate business and technical requirements and identify new solutions.
  • Work directly with stakeholders, engineering and test to create high quality products that solve customer problem
  • Handle ambiguity with grace and shields employees from confusion.

Requirements

  • Experience leading a project from concept phase through product launch
  • Familiar with developing software in Realtime Operating System or Embedded Linux development environment.
  • Strong programming experience and demonstrated proficiency in C/C++ for embedded systems, including development of algorithms, manipulation of complex data structures, and implementing highly optimized code
  • Consumer electronics experience or familiarity with 3-4 or relevant technologies: multi-core ARM processors, GPUs, WiFi/BT, cameras.
  • Familiarity with ARM or equivalent embedded multi-core microprocessor architectures is required
  • Strong understanding of operating systems concepts such as thread scheduling, context switching and memory management is required.
  • Ability to understand hardware design and schematics.
  • Prior experience with overseeing board bring-up and validation
  • Extensive knowledge in design and programming in an Embedded Systems environment.
  • Expert knowledge of developing modular software using C or C++ in an Embedded platform
  • Experienced in project planning, effort estimation, delivery management.
  • Capable of understanding Hardware/Software interfaces and reading schematics.
  • Very good understanding of communication interfaces like CAN, RS232, I2C, SPI, Ethernet
  • Good knowledge of embedded tools like emulators, linkers, makefiles, Yocto toolchain is essential.

  • Experience in EV/ Robotics
  • Experienced with Global Cross functional Team Handling.

  • Experience writing multithreaded software and class libraries is desired.
  • If the candidate has had experience working on projects for student clubs and organizations like robotics club, SAE (Society of Automotive Engineers), Solar Boat, EV Club, etc.
  • Management experience in driving a highly technical team.
  • WExperience with:
    • Experience writing multithreaded software and class libraries is desired.
    • MISRA C, unit testing, static analysis tools
    • Python scripting
    • Embedded microprocessor toolchain
    • Familiarity with ARM cores
    • Familiarity with processors from TI (C2000, Hercules, MSP430, etc.), Freescale (MPC560x), Infineon, STMicro
    • Familiarity with embedded RTOS (eg. freeRTOS, MQX, DSP BIOS, etc.)

Competitive Salary

In Campus

  • Contribute in improving the time to market for the products and solutions with utmost focus on quality.

  • Capable of supporting and sustaining a positive work environment that fosters team performance.

  • Responsible for managing and delivering hardware development.
  • Training, instructing, supporting, mentoring and monitoring team’s work.

  • In Depth understanding of electronics/power electronics product design, development and engineering.
  • Experience in Complex High speed System/Product Design that includes System Architecture Design, Hardware Design, PCB Design , SI , EMI , Testing , with extensive experience in full life cycle of Product Development, Manufacturing, Supply chain, Test platform Design
  • Experience on architecting and designing of Networking, Telcomm systems, Telematics , Consumer Electronics and IOT and high speed board design.
  • Proficient with electronic circuit design (analog and digital), schematics, BOM and PCB layout guidelines.
